content: a quick and easy pattern for a practical and versatile soft crystal keeper to wear your favorite crystal this sweet little cotton crystal holder will gently hold your stone securely without risk of scratching it it s super practical being easy to open and close to change the crystals pattern has been tested for errors and is written in us terms with uk shown in abbreviations free version on website is for adult size a very low cost ad-free easy print pdf includes both adult and child necklace sizes plus a keychain version too they are perfect gifts for crystal loving friends and a super quick popular make for craft fairs suggested yarn is any dk or 4ply cotton hook size 3mm - us d using a thicker yarn will make it a little bigger it uses a very small amount just a few yards so is perfect for using up scraps this pattern has been tested for errors but if you have any problems please just get in touch with me i d love to share your finished crystal keepers just use the tags #crochetcrystalkeeper #thecraftytherapist and tag me @thecraftytherapist in social media posts are we email friends email subscribers get exclusive generous discounts you can join by clicking here note on selling items and copyright the pattern and all images belong to janferie mackintosh all rights reserved you may not copy or redistribute any part of the pattern you may not alter it and then claim it as your own pattern yes you may sell your finished items handmade in small batches by you only credit to me as the designer is appreciated please note that instant download pdf files cannot be refunded www thecraftytherapist com
